author: hwright
msg: Ev2 shims: Handle the absent operations when converting from Ev2 to the delta
(add_absent_cb): Create an absent node in the operation tree.

author: gsingers
msg: MAHOUT-868: rename scripts to drop the build stuff.  also added a README

author: sarowe
msg: LUCENE-3490: Maven configuration: put lucene-test-framework before lucene-core in the test classpath, via dependency ordering, to allow test-only read/write PreFlexRWCodec to fulfill Lucene3x codec requests instead of lucene-core's read-only Lucene3xCodec
